name: c̷̙̽ü̵͍r̴͕͋s̷̄ͅê̴̩d̷͖̀ ̵͙̏l̷̗̈́e̷̹̅a̶̟̍s̵̟͛h̴̤̀ (CURSED LEASH)
description:
Made by Stephan Bogner and Jan C. Borchardt. The project is open source.

Inspired by spaceBOUND, GTA2, A Short Hike, Hotline Miami, Paperboy, and Untitled Goose Game. ♥

  • Almost all models by Quaternius
  • Background picture by Lance Asper
  • Chiptune Loop Episode 04 by originaljun
  • Leash by noricum
  • Cursed text generator
  • Dirty keyboard by ybsme
  • Controller by unmatched value
  • Godot Game Engine
